description.value:
You meander around unpredictably, and then ambush your opponents without warning.

Choose one enemy. Stride, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Feint] against that opponent, and then make a Strike against that foe. For your Feint, you can attempt a Stealth check instead of the Deception check that's usually required, because you use the terrain around you to catch your foe off-guard.
